mapper.sql: id, operate_user_id, operate_user_realname, operate_entity_id, operate_entity_name, operate_entity_comment, operate_type, operate_type_name, operate_time,flag
mapper.select: SELECT o.*,od.id as oid,od.entity_operate_record_id, od.new_value,od.old_value,od.property_comment,od.property_name from operate_record o JOIN operate_record_detail od on o.id=od.entity_operate_record_id and o.flag = #{flag}
mapper.insert:
insert into operate_record
id,
operate_user_id,
operate_user_realname,
operate_entity_id,
operate_entity_name,
operate_entity_comment,
operate_type,
operate_type_name,
operate_time,
#{id,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{operateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operateUserRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operateEntityId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{operateEntityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operateEntityComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{operateTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update operate_record
operate_user_id = #{operateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_user_realname = #{operateUserRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_entity_id = #{operateEntityId,jdbcType=CHAR},
operate_entity_name = #{operateEntityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_entity_comment = #{operateEntityComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_type_name = #{operateTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update operate_record set operate_user_id = #{operateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_user_realname = #{operateUserRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_entity_id = #{operateEntityId,jdbcType=CHAR}, operate_entity_name = #{operateEntityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_entity_comment = #{operateEntityComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_type_name = #{operateTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
